title: Shootout in Mexico: 11 armed attackers killed in police confrontation
content: A violent confrontation in Nuevo Leon, Mexico resulted in the deaths of 11 armed attackers who targeted a police station in General Teran. State police, the national guard, and the army launched an operation that led to capturing one suspect and seizing six pick-up trucks while pursuing the attackers along a highway near Monterrey.
summary: A violent confrontation in Nuevo Leon, Mexico resulted in the deaths of 11 armed attackers who targeted a police station in General Teran. State police, the national guard, and the army launched an operation that led to capturing one suspect and seizing six pick-up trucks while pursuing the attackers along a highway near Monterrey.

title: 'I don't think...': Elon Musk responds to exclusion from UK international investment summit
content: Elon Musk has been excluded from the UK's International Investment Summit due to his controversial social media posts criticizing UK policies on prison overcrowding. This decision follows last month's Southport riots, where some were jailed for inciting violence online. Officials view his absence as a significant loss for the event aimed at attracting foreign investment.
summary: Elon Musk has been excluded from the UK's International Investment Summit due to his controversial social media posts criticizing UK policies on prison overcrowding. This decision follows last month's Southport riots, where some were jailed for inciting violence online. Officials view his absence as a significant loss for the event aimed at attracting foreign investment.

title: 10-year-olds' reaction to Donald Trump, Kamala Harris viral: 'Liar, pure evil'
content: CNN interviewed 80 elementary school children from Arizona, New Jersey, and Texas to understand their views on presidential candidates Donald Trump and Kamala Harris. Responses included calling Harris a 'liar' and Trump 'pure evil.' Despite differing opinions, most kids supported the idea of having a woman of color as president, CNN said.
summary: CNN interviewed 80 elementary school children from Arizona, New Jersey, and Texas to understand their views on presidential candidates Donald Trump and Kamala Harris. Responses included calling Harris a 'liar' and Trump 'pure evil.' Despite differing opinions, most kids supported the idea of having a woman of color as president, CNN said.

title: Florida cop arrested for intoxicating and 'fooling around' with underage girl
content: A Florida police officer was arrested for allegedly getting an underage girl drunk and engaging in sexual activity with her. The officer met the girl through an app, bought alcohol, and took her to his apartment. He faces multiple charges including lewd conduct and contributing to delinquency of a minor, and has been terminated.
summary: A Florida police officer was arrested for allegedly getting an underage girl drunk and engaging in sexual activity with her. The officer met the girl through an app, bought alcohol, and took her to his apartment. He faces multiple charges including lewd conduct and contributing to delinquency of a minor, and has been terminated.

title: Watch: Eric Adams told 'You are a disgrace for all Black...' during press conference
content: ​The 57-page indictment said since 2014 when Eric Adams became Brooklyn Borough president, he has been seeking and accepting improper valuable benefits such as luxury international travel and one of them was from one Turkish government official who sought to gain influence over him. The indictment said the mayor agreed providing favorable treatment in exchange for the illicit benefits he received.
summary: ​The 57-page indictment said since 2014 when Eric Adams became Brooklyn Borough president, he has been seeking and accepting improper valuable benefits such as luxury international travel and one of them was from one Turkish government official who sought to gain influence over him. The indictment said the mayor agreed providing favorable treatment in exchange for the illicit benefits he received.

title: Hurricane Helene set to strike Florida as a 'catastrophic' category 4 storm
content: Hurricane Helene is set to make landfall in Florida's 'Big Bend' as a category 4 storm. Officials have issued mandatory evacuation orders due to expected life-threatening conditions like destructive winds and significant storm surges. The southeastern United States faces severe threats, including power outages, flash flooding, and potential tornadoes.
summary: Hurricane Helene is set to make landfall in Florida's 'Big Bend' as a category 4 storm. Officials have issued mandatory evacuation orders due to expected life-threatening conditions like destructive winds and significant storm surges. The southeastern United States faces severe threats, including power outages, flash flooding, and potential tornadoes.

title: Trump ex lawyer Giuliani disbarred in DC over 2020 election claims
Finnish zoo returning pandas to China eight years early, calling them ‘too costly to keep’
content: Facing financial challenges and a drop in visitors, Ähtäri Zoo in Finland plans to return two giant pandas to China eight years early. Loaned in 2018 for a 15-year term, the pandas Lumi and Pyry will be sent back later this year due to high upkeep costs.
summary: Facing financial challenges and a drop in visitors, Ähtäri Zoo in Finland plans to return two giant pandas to China eight years early. Loaned in 2018 for a 15-year term, the pandas Lumi and Pyry will be sent back later this year due to high upkeep costs.

title: Free at home Covid-19 tests services back in US: Here's all you need to know
content: In response to increasing COVID-19 cases in the US, the Biden administration has relaunched its free at-home test program. Households can order up to four tests without any cost through the COVIDTests.gov website. Shipping begins on September 30, and no identification or payment is needed for ordering.
summary: In response to increasing COVID-19 cases in the US, the Biden administration has relaunched its free at-home test program. Households can order up to four tests without any cost through the COVIDTests.gov website. Shipping begins on September 30, and no identification or payment is needed for ordering.

title: Biden gives 'salesman' Zelenskyy more weapons as Trump fumes about US getting suckered
content: President Joe Biden unveiled an $8 billion security aid package for Ukraine, featuring a glide bomb to enhance its strike capabilities against Russia. This move has ignited criticism from MAGA leaders and heightened fears of nuclear escalation from Moscow. Russian President Vladimir Putin cautioned about revising Russia's nuclear doctrine in response to such threats.
summary: President Joe Biden unveiled an $8 billion security aid package for Ukraine, featuring a glide bomb to enhance its strike capabilities against Russia. This move has ignited criticism from MAGA leaders and heightened fears of nuclear escalation from Moscow. Russian President Vladimir Putin cautioned about revising Russia's nuclear doctrine in response to such threats.

title: Viral: Chinese woman 'shocked' by the number of Indians in Canada. 'People who didn't know...'
content: ​Social media users asked why it was terrible for the woman. "A Chinese seething about immigrants in Canada is something..." a user wrote. "Was in Canada a few months ago and can confirm, although the remaining white Canadians are still very nice people, but maybe they're too nice for their own good," another wrote.
summary: ​Social media users asked why it was terrible for the woman. "A Chinese seething about immigrants in Canada is something..." a user wrote. "Was in Canada a few months ago and can confirm, although the remaining white Canadians are still very nice people, but maybe they're too nice for their own good," another wrote.

title: 'Very difficult': Melania on conversation with Barron Trump about assassination attempt on Donald
content: On a question on how was Melania's conversation with Barron when Donald Trump was shot at in Pennsylvania, Melania said it was a very difficult discussion. Barron was playing outside and he rushed inside. On the day of the second assassination attempt, Melania said she was in New York city and she saw it on television. "I called him and he was okay. The Secret Service guys were with him, they were great, fantastic," Melania said.
summary: On a question on how was Melania's conversation with Barron when Donald Trump was shot at in Pennsylvania, Melania said it was a very difficult discussion. Barron was playing outside and he rushed inside. On the day of the second assassination attempt, Melania said she was in New York city and she saw it on television. "I called him and he was okay. The Secret Service guys were with him, they were great, fantastic," Melania said.

title: Brazil's drought drives coffee and sugar prices to record highs amid global supply concerns
content: Brazil's severe drought continues to impact its coffee and sugar production, driving global prices to new highs. Farmland fires and damage to the arabica crop are significant issues. Some rain is forecasted but may not arrive until mid-to-late October. Vietnam's robusta coffee output might alleviate some price pressures despite earlier weather challenges.
summary: Brazil's severe drought continues to impact its coffee and sugar production, driving global prices to new highs. Farmland fires and damage to the arabica crop are significant issues. Some rain is forecasted but may not arrive until mid-to-late October. Vietnam's robusta coffee output might alleviate some price pressures despite earlier weather challenges.

title: When LeBron James said 'Ain't no party like Diddy party' in resurfaced video
content: ​​Diddy has not pleaded guilty to three felony counts and has been refused bail. His arrest would open a can of worms as several celebrities were linked to him and apparently took part in his Freak Off parties. But no one has yet been implicated and just taking part in his Freak Offs won't mean they were also involved in trafficking.
summary: ​​Diddy has not pleaded guilty to three felony counts and has been refused bail. His arrest would open a can of worms as several celebrities were linked to him and apparently took part in his Freak Off parties. But no one has yet been implicated and just taking part in his Freak Offs won't mean they were also involved in trafficking.

title: 'Chill the f**k out': Woman 'steals' man's Apple charger on JetBlue flight, says she was going to give it back
content: ​As the video posted by the man went viral now showing the woman as an unscrupulous thief, Vanessa, the woman, shared her side of the story. She said the incident took place almost over a year ago but now that the man's video went viral on TikTok, she was bombarded with harassment and hence felt the need to come up with a clarification.
summary: ​As the video posted by the man went viral now showing the woman as an unscrupulous thief, Vanessa, the woman, shared her side of the story. She said the incident took place almost over a year ago but now that the man's video went viral on TikTok, she was bombarded with harassment and hence felt the need to come up with a clarification.

title: 'There are consequences if ... ': Russia widens nuclear weapons doctrine, issues warning to West
content: The Kremlin has updated its nuclear doctrine, allowing for the use of nuclear weapons against non-nuclear states under certain conditions. This change is aimed at countries supporting Ukraine in its conflict with Russia. The revised policy expands the list of military threats that could justify a nuclear response and includes more states and alliances.
summary: The Kremlin has updated its nuclear doctrine, allowing for the use of nuclear weapons against non-nuclear states under certain conditions. This change is aimed at countries supporting Ukraine in its conflict with Russia. The revised policy expands the list of military threats that could justify a nuclear response and includes more states and alliances.

title: Israel rejects ceasefire plans, says goal to 'crush' Hezbollah in Lebanon
content: Israeli finance minister Bezalel Smotrich has turned down a 21-day ceasefire proposal, stating that the offensive should conclude with Hezbollah's defeat. The US and its allies had suggested the ceasefire to prevent further escalation. Israeli airstrikes have hit multiple Hezbollah targets in Lebanon, as concerns about a full-scale war grow.
summary: Israeli finance minister Bezalel Smotrich has turned down a 21-day ceasefire proposal, stating that the offensive should conclude with Hezbollah's defeat. The US and its allies had suggested the ceasefire to prevent further escalation. Israeli airstrikes have hit multiple Hezbollah targets in Lebanon, as concerns about a full-scale war grow.

title: Kate Middleton reaches out to 'homesick' Prince Harry after spotting 'worrying signs': Report
content: On September 15, Prince Harry turned 40 and received birthday wishes from Kate Middleton and Prince William. Kate crafted the message to help restore peace between Harry and his family amid ongoing tensions. The gesture was appreciated by Harry, who celebrated with his family in California before attending a gathering with friends.
summary: On September 15, Prince Harry turned 40 and received birthday wishes from Kate Middleton and Prince William. Kate crafted the message to help restore peace between Harry and his family amid ongoing tensions. The gesture was appreciated by Harry, who celebrated with his family in California before attending a gathering with friends.

title: Taliban calls gender discrimination claims 'absurd' as four nations push for legal action
content: The Taliban have denied allegations of gender discrimination and human rights abuses amid plans by Australia, Canada, Germany, and the Netherlands to take legal action against them. These countries seek to hold Afghanistan accountable under international law for its treatment of women and girls. The initiative has garnered support from over 20 nations.
summary: The Taliban have denied allegations of gender discrimination and human rights abuses amid plans by Australia, Canada, Germany, and the Netherlands to take legal action against them. These countries seek to hold Afghanistan accountable under international law for its treatment of women and girls. The initiative has garnered support from over 20 nations.

title: Alabama schedules second Nitrogen gas execution amid controversy
content: Alabama is preparing for its second nitrogen gas execution amid debates on the method's humaneness. The first use in January led to a painful death for Kenneth Smith, raising constitutional concerns. Alam Eugene Miller, convicted of triple murder, is scheduled next. Critics urge further evaluation before proceeding with more executions.
summary: Alabama is preparing for its second nitrogen gas execution amid debates on the method's humaneness. The first use in January led to a painful death for Kenneth Smith, raising constitutional concerns. Alam Eugene Miller, convicted of triple murder, is scheduled next. Critics urge further evaluation before proceeding with more executions.
